# poispkgs

An R package to install and attach CRAN and GitHub Packages used in Poisson Consulting analyses

## Demonstration
```{r}
search()
library(poispkgs)
search()
```

## Installation

To install the latest development version from the Poisson drat [repository](https://github.com/poissonconsulting/drat).
```
install.packages("drat")
drat::addRepo("poissonconsulting")
install.packages("poispkgs")
```
